data.text:
@jjchamie 2/2. HIGHLY SIGNIFICANT stuff: 
D rate 4 all recorded CV cases is 1.9%, but 6% for 60+
97.7% of dead were 60+
# of 60+ cases % in Osaka were c2x Tokyo
206 of 390 deaths since Fall were from clusters (nursing homes + med facilities)
SO, did Kanto Sr homes get Iver & Kansai Molnu?

@jjchamie Saw no Feb article yet but read below re Kansai vs Kanto publ 1/13. They guessed the great gap u noted was due to >3-4 gen households, >elders >commuting. NO, diffs only enuf to explain part of diff case# & barely signif. to explain high death-rate. 1/2

https://t.co/Bu29jNUK4k
@MakingC19Waves @jjchamie You don’t have the Japanese Ivermectin study, by any chance please?

@jjchamie Guess: Why did Merck kill it's Nobel prize wonder drug IVM with 33 yrs safety profile (https://t.co/aKpuOoHcpc, https://t.co/2w6vyAm9Ci). ▪︎Controversy about IVM  is only political reasons (Cheap, Off-patent & SAFE). https://t.co/ju9dOSiEWD

@jjchamie Living in Japan from 1979-1998, I ❤️ed how The Japan Times filled a page or two every week with extraordinary medical discoveries. I am😰&😡to read of this craven surrender to Big Pharma. It seems Japanese still lack confidence to stand up to the West or are equally corrupt.

@jjchamie Japan already has a relatively low number of people having children and an aging population. Yet they are going to now use a minimal effective drug with mutagenic potential? The drug requires at least 3 months of condom use after 5 days of treatment in men. 🤦🏽‍♀️

@jjchamie Japan resident here. Although IVM isn't actively suppressed like in the west, it doesn't seem actively promoted or widely used either. The Japanese govt is too busy trying to use up its stock of expired vaccines.
https://t.co/xbmzCdsvdF
